body.name: Rectangular Black Full-Length Mirror - 48"x14" | Over-The-Door or Wall Mounted Hanging Mirror | Full Body Reflection for Bedroom Décor | Aluminum Alloy Frame | Door Mirror with Elegant Design
features: Elegant Black Design: Elevate your space with our 48x14 rectangular Wall Mirror featuring a sleek and modern rounded corner design. Its stylish curvature adds a touch of sophistication to any room, creating a focal point that seamlessly enhances your décor

Versatile Over-The-Door or Wall Mounting: Enjoy flexibility in placement with our mirror designed for both over-the-door and wall mounting. Perfect for maximizing space in smaller rooms, this mirror effortlessly adapts to your preferred setting, whether on the door or as a stunning wall accent

Full-Length Reflection: Experience the luxury of a full-body reflection with our generously sized 48 x 14 mirror. This full-length design ensures you can check your outfit from head to toe, making it a practical and stylish addition to your bedroom, dressing room, or closet

Premium Aluminum Alloy Frame: Crafted with durability in mind, the mirror features a sturdy Aluminum Alloy Frame in a radiant black finish. Not only does it provide reliable support, but it also adds a touch of modern glamour, making it a functional and decorative piece in one

Easy Installation and Secure Hanging: Set up your mirror effortlessly with the included hardware and instructions. The secure hanging system ensures stability and peace of mind, so you can enjoy the beauty of your black Full-Length Mirror without any hassle. Transform your space with this statement piece that combines functionality and style

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegance and Functionality Combined - XRAMFY Gold Arched Full-Length Mirror
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is a stunning addition to any bedroom, offering both aesthetic appeal and practical functionality. From its elegant design to its versatile mounting options, this mirror exceeds expectations and enhances the overall décor of the space.Pros:Elegant Design: The gold arched frame adds a touch of sophistication and elegance to any room. The design is not only aesthetically pleasing but also complements various interior styles, from modern to classic.Full-Length Reflection: With dimensions of 48"x14", this full-length mirror provides a complete reflection, allowing users to check their outfits or appearance with ease. The size is perfect for ensuring a head-to-toe view.Versatile Mounting Options: Whether you prefer an over-the-door or wall-mounted setup, the XRAMFY mirror accommodates both options. This flexibility makes it suitable for different room layouts and personal preferences.Aluminum Alloy Frame: The mirror's frame crafted from aluminum alloy not only enhances its durability but also adds a touch of lightweight sophistication. The gold finish gives it a premium look without compromising on sturdiness.Easy Installation: Setting up the mirror is a breeze, thanks to its user-friendly design and included mounting hardware. Users can choose their preferred mounting method and have the mirror ready for use in no time.Enhances Room Décor: Beyond its practical use, this mirror serves as a decorative element, contributing to an elevated and cohesive bedroom décor. It effortlessly becomes a focal point, elevating the overall aesthetic of the space.Cons:Size Limitation: For those desiring an even larger mirror, the 48"x14" dimensions may be a bit restrictive. However, the size is well-suited for standard bedroom spaces.Conclusion:This mirror seamlessly blends style and functionality. Its elegant design, versatile mounting options, and high-quality construction make it a standout piece for bedroom décor. The aluminum alloy frame ensures durability, and the choice between over-the-door and wall-mounted installation adds to its appeal. While some users may prefer a larger size, the 48"x14" dimensions strike a balance between practicality and visual impact. Overall, this mirror is a fantastic choice for those seeking a chic and versatile full-length mirror to enhance their bedroom space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty looking mirror and very functional since ei do not like making holes on walls and doors! the design and size to ensure it complements your bedroom décor.Over-the-door or wall-mounted mirror is versatile, I like it over the door and I am glad the idea of the over the door hook is here cause then I do not need to make holes on the door and can move the mirror with ease to another home or another room.A good full-length mirror and it provide a clear and accurate reflection. I feel like the mirror is well made and I like to believe I look great in this mirror, no warping image or any kind of distortion.The frame is great looking and the material is of good quality, I am sure this mirror will last a long time.I am pretty happy about the mirror, it does what it came here to do, while looking nice and stylish, adding to my decor and being very easily movable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm pleased with this XRAMFY mirror. The aluminum frame has a nice, gold and blemish free finish. It's a good size for either over a door or a wall. the mirror is flat and without distortions.The most impressive thing about this mirror is that it holds its form. I've had too many mirrors that flex or bow when hung on a wall, or the frame comes apart over time. This mirror is stiff and sturdy and will hold its shape.The hardware is good for hanging over a door. The hooks are squared and fit nicely over a standard bedroom, closet or bathroom door. It doesn't bang when the door is opened.The hardware is easy to attach and the predrilled holes on the back of the frame are precise. The only issue I had was the included hollow wall fasteners. I prefer heavier duty hollow wall fasteners. The ones included are adequate.I think this looks great. I like having a mirror that will hold its shape. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First of all, this thing came in top notch packaging they certainly were doing their best to avoid seven years of bad luck.The mirror looks nice and was as described. The frame is not wood, so there is some flex to it. We chose the door hanging route in the bathroom since it had the best light. The two hang hooks screw into mounts in the back of the mirror frame and have the option to hang it a little higher on the door. We have 8" doors though, so we hung it on the lowest option.There are two stick on pads for the bottom of the frame to both protect it from slamming into the door when opened and closed, and to stick it too the door if you pull off both sides of the sticky tape block. The hardware even came with a screw driver, so you don't even need tools unless you choose to wall mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s a nice mirror
reviews.reviewText: So the mirror is nice but the listing is really messed up. I clicked on the listing that said “rectangle edge” mirror but was sent the “arched” mirror! I was so confused and disappointed when I received it in the mail and saw it was the arched mirror. I went back to the listing to investigate and I realized that the arched mirror in the picture says it’s “rectangle edge” and the picture of the rectangle edge says “arched”. So you’ll want to be sure you choose going by the PICTURE of the mirror you want and not by what it actually says it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is such a a beautiful mirror from the perfect gold plated corol around it to the oval top shape. The mirror will add elegance to any room or event you add it to. It is sturdy and lightweight for an easy move. Its very much so, worth its value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean and clear with a great quality!
reviews.reviewText: This mirror has a very sturdy frame, and the glass is extremely clear with a really nice clean reflection.Mounting on the wall was not that difficult, it just took a level and a couple of screws!It made my dull looking wall into a nice modern and beautiful one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy over door mirror
reviews.reviewText: Nice value for an over the door mirror. I thought it would be a tad bigger but it will work fine. Easy to assemble the hooks. Has an option to hang on wall. Came well packaged
